title: Does Riot even play their own game?
body:
Like seriously
theres a few champions that are unbalanced like rengar and fiora
they do infinite damage and have infinite healing
its impossible to kill them and there is no way to counter
you just have to sit there watching them wipe your whole team with 1 item

this is bs and would like riot to play their own game to see this for themselves

replies.body:
Hey LadyLuxanna, Riot definitely play their own game!
I'm sorry to hear your experience has not been what you wanted it to be, with champions causing some trouble. 
Believe me when I say we all experience the exact same troubles every day! Rengar and Fiora can both be nightmarish to deal with when they get ahead.

Much like you, they share your struggles as they play every day. It's not always as simple as these two champions are creating negative experiences and need to be fixed!

In the meantime, Rengar has the benefit of being countered via pink wards, with less focus being placed on regular wards due to their removal, generally a free item slot will now be available for a pink instead! This is the best way to counter Rengar, if you're playing a mage i'd suggest an earlier Zhonya's Hourglass

For Fiora there are many ways to play around her kit, she can't always insta kill you if you dodge the first Lunge that she makes towards you! Also her ultimate can be removed (and largely a lot of her damage) via a Quicksilver Sash!

Hope these two points can help with the champions you're struggling to play against.

lol, try learning to play the game then.

rengar is one of the easiest champs to kill atm

i do agree fiora is hard to kill, but if you can get solid cc on her she drops like a fly
